description:
Pan-Dimensional Conga Combat is an old-school, rhythm-synchronised, score-chasing arcade game that plays like some alien coin-op from another dimension.

Grab your Conganoid and join the competitive ceremonial slaughter of annoyingly happy (yet extremely deadly) geometric, pan-dimensional critters!

Defend yourself using your bullet tail, close portals by looping around them, and charge up your hyper-destructive mega-lazor by laying a path of bullets in front of the mindless, drifting Purploids.

Oh, and stay the hell away from the EVIL X - those dudes are BAD news!

Play solo in Arcade or Survival mode - perfect for that coffee-break adrenaline blast! - or choose multiplayer mode to battle your friends and family for high-score supremacy!

FEATURES:
- Rhythm-synchronized arcade action!
- Four different dimensions to unlock!
- Two different single-player modes!
- Local four-player high-score battle mode!
- Heavyweight acid/chip/funk soundtrack!
- Online Leaderboards!
name: Pan-Dimensional Conga Combat
